attributes.action: Falkland Islands Immediately Handed To Argentina
attributes.additional_details: The Government of the UK must immediately admit and recognize that the Falkland Islands are and always have been part of ARGENTINA and so officially ends the illegal occupation and holding of the Falkland Islands. The government must revoke any British citicenship of people living on the Falkland Island, if these people do not choose to leave the Falklands and settle within the UK. The Government of UK must distance itself from all imperialistic and illegal acting and actions of the part.
